short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: MedDream DICOM Viewer browser extension for multi-monitors

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
MedDream DICOM Viewer multi display browser extension requires Google Chrome browser version 52 or newer. Multi Display requires more than one displays and can work with 2 or more displays at once. Please note, that extension requires displays with same resolution.

Installation manual: https://www.softneta.com/files/meddreamviewer/doc/MedDream-DICOM-Viewer-MultiMonitors-Manual.pdf

Tutorial on MedDream DICOM Viewer extension for multi-monitors configuration: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-ONVBPtPVFM&feature=youtu.be
